message: Let's make a fair deal, 60-40 is reasonable considering the inflation rate difference.

Your initial offer was a good starting point, but the inflation disparity doesn't justify a 60/40 split in the first round.  I'm proposing a 55/45 split to acknowledge the inflation difference while still reaching a more equitable outcome.
Given the current values after inflation, I suggest this division to maintain a fair balance, taking into account the decreased worth for both of us.
